room_title: Escape room "Doctor Frankenstein" by Komnata Quest in New York
room_description: The Frankenstein legend is one of the most horrifying stories ever imagined. He is a giant monster made out of body parts stolen from the graveyard. A mad scientist sewed them together and brought the homunculus to life by electricity. Now you have only one hour to repeat his gruesome work and revitalize the beast. Try to unravel the mystery of Frankenstein in a mystical world of airships and steam machines.
